languages.text: {n}Вы осторожно приближаете к морде кибермастифа открытую ладонь и ждете реакции пса. Глейто не сводит с вас темных глаз, на дне которых тлеет алая искра. Наконец, вы касаетесь холки и гладите жесткую шерсть, то и дело задевая пальцами холодные края аугментаций.{/n}

{n}You carefully bring an open hand closer to the cyber-mastiff's face and wait for his reaction. Glaito's dark eyes are watching you, a crimson spark smouldering within. At last, you touch the back of his neck and start stroking his rough fur, your fingers brushing against the cold edges of the dog's augmetics.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы осторожно приближаете к морде кибермастифа открытую ладонь и ждете реакции пса. Глейто не сводит с вас темных глаз, на дне которых тлеет алая искра. Наконец, вы касаетесь холки и гладите жесткую шерсть, то и дело задевая пальцами холодные края аугментаций.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはそっと開いた手をサイバーマスチフの顔の近くに差し出し、反応をうかがった。グライトの暗い瞳がじっとあなたを見つめ、その奥には赤い火花のような光が静かにくすぶっている。やがて、あなたは彼の首筋に触れ、ざらついた毛並みをゆっくりとなで始めた。指先が、冷たいオーグメティックの縁にかすかに触れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully bring an open hand closer to the cyber-mastiff's face and wait for his reaction. Glaito's dark eyes are watching you, a crimson spark smouldering within. At last, you touch the back of his neck and start stroking his rough fur, your fingers brushing against the cold edges of the dog's augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはそっと開いた手をサイバーマスチフの顔の近くに差し出し、反応をうかがった。グライトの暗い瞳がじっとあなたを見つめ、その奥には赤い火花のような光が静かにくすぶっている。やがて、あなたは彼の首筋に触れ、ざらついた毛並みをゆっくりとなで始めた。指先が、冷たいオーグメティックの縁にかすかに触れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bewegst eine offene Hand vorsichtig näher an das Gesicht des Cyber-Mastiffs heran und wartest auf seine Reaktion. Glaitos dunkle Augen beobachten dich, in ihnen lodert ein roter Funke. Schließlich berührst du seinen Nacken und streichelst sein raues Fell, wobei deine Finger gegen die kalten Kanten der Augmentationen des Hundes stoßen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully bring an open hand closer to the cyber-mastiff's face and wait for his reaction. Glaito's dark eyes are watching you, a crimson spark smouldering within. At last, you touch the back of his neck and start stroking his rough fur, your fingers brushing against the cold edges of the dog's augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bewegst eine offene Hand vorsichtig näher an das Gesicht des Cyber-Mastiffs heran und wartest auf seine Reaktion. Glaitos dunkle Augen beobachten dich, in ihnen lodert ein roter Funke. Schließlich berührst du seinen Nacken und streichelst sein raues Fell, wobei deine Finger gegen die kalten Kanten der Augmentationen des Hundes stoßen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous approchez doucement votre main ouverte de la gueule du cyber-mastiff et attendez de voir sa réaction. Glaito vous observe de ses yeux sombres, éclairés d'une étincelle écarlate. Vous finissez par poser votre main sur sa nuque pour caresser sa fourrure rêche, effleurant le métal froid de ses augmétiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully bring an open hand closer to the cyber-mastiff's face and wait for his reaction. Glaito's dark eyes are watching you, a crimson spark smouldering within. At last, you touch the back of his neck and start stroking his rough fur, your fingers brushing against the cold edges of the dog's augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous approchez doucement votre main ouverte de la gueule du cyber-mastiff et attendez de voir sa réaction. Glaito vous observe de ses yeux sombres, éclairés d'une étincelle écarlate. Vous finissez par poser votre main sur sa nuque pour caresser sa fourrure rêche, effleurant le métal froid de ses augmétiques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Acercas la mano con cautela al rostro del cibermastín y aguardas a ver cómo reacciona. Glaito te observa con sus oscuros ojos, en los que brilla un rescoldo carmesí. Finalmente tocas su pescuezo y empiezas a acariciar su áspero pelaje, rozando con los dedos el frío contorno metálico de los auméticos del perro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully bring an open hand closer to the cyber-mastiff's face and wait for his reaction. Glaito's dark eyes are watching you, a crimson spark smouldering within. At last, you touch the back of his neck and start stroking his rough fur, your fingers brushing against the cold edges of the dog's augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Acercas la mano con cautela al rostro del cibermastín y aguardas a ver cómo reacciona. Glaito te observa con sus oscuros ojos, en los que brilla un rescoldo carmesí. Finalmente tocas su pescuezo y empiezas a acariciar su áspero pelaje, rozando con los dedos el frío contorno metálico de los auméticos del perro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你小心翼翼张开了手，靠近格雷托的脸，等待着它的反应。格雷托用黑眼睛注视着你，目光深处燃烧着深红色的火花。到了最后，你触碰到了它的后颈，抚摸起了它粗糙的皮毛，手指擦过植入物冰冷的边缘。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully bring an open hand closer to the cyber-mastiff's face and wait for his reaction. Glaito's dark eyes are watching you, a crimson spark smouldering within. At last, you touch the back of his neck and start stroking his rough fur, your fingers brushing against the cold edges of the dog's augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你小心翼翼张开了手，靠近格雷托的脸，等待着它的反应。格雷托用黑眼睛注视着你，目光深处燃烧着深红色的火花。到了最后，你触碰到了它的后颈，抚摸起了它粗糙的皮毛，手指擦过植入物冰冷的边缘。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avucunu dikkatlice siber mastifin yüzüne yaklaştırıp tepkisini bekliyorsun. İçi kızıl bir kıvılcımla yanan Glaito'nun karanlık gözleri seni izliyor. Nihayetinde ensesine dokunuyor ve sert tüylerini okşamaya başlıyorsun. Parmakların, köpeğin ogmetiklerinin soğuk kenarlarına sürtünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully bring an open hand closer to the cyber-mastiff's face and wait for his reaction. Glaito's dark eyes are watching you, a crimson spark smouldering within. At last, you touch the back of his neck and start stroking his rough fur, your fingers brushing against the cold edges of the dog's augmetics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avucunu dikkatlice siber mastifin yüzüne yaklaştırıp tepkisini bekliyorsun. İçi kızıl bir kıvılcımla yanan Glaito'nun karanlık gözleri seni izliyor. Nihayetinde ensesine dokunuyor ve sert tüylerini okşamaya başlıyorsun. Parmakların köpeğin ogmetiklerinin soğuk kenarlarına sürtünüyor.{/n}
